troubleshooting.title: Chat, prompts, or new windows are not opening in mySWS

ul.li: When you click a link in mySWS to go to chat, your document, or a new page, nothing happens.
You are not recieiving prompts or confirmation pop-up windows in mySWS.

cause.title: Cause
cause.p: You have prevented pop-ups or browser dialog windows from showing up.

step.cmd: Turn off your pop-up blocker in your browser's settings while using mySWS.
Turn off any ad blockers installed on your browser or computer while using mySWS.
